e702282e-949d-4d21-81cf-d872b746bb75.name: Combat Reflexes
e702282e-949d-4d21-81cf-d872b746bb75.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

2e0e640c-b77c-4e2e-bd68-645c18245c94.name: Off-Hand Weapon Training (@Weapon@)
2e0e640c-b77c-4e2e-bd68-645c18245c94.notes: Replaces equal-named technique on p. B232

4ead00c3-25e6-49f5-ae2a-112eacdf64f2.name: Weapon Bond
4ead00c3-25e6-49f5-ae2a-112eacdf64f2.notes: You own a Weapon that is uniquely suited to you.

5ed1071f-4919-444b-82bd-87b4cbc02ff4.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

dc0698f0-8587-450b-accd-392ffd6ed87d.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

7e7171c1-5dd5-429d-8b18-043bb36156f8.name: Legal Enforcement Powers (@Federal or Secret Service@)

6e1ba9e2-1cba-4957-8b0d-61fd36b10ebd.name: Luck, Extraordinary
6e1ba9e2-1cba-4957-8b0d-61fd36b10ebd.notes: Usable once per 30 minutes of play

5a8fd983-69f0-4094-b2d4-e7f6aa5ed888.name: Easy to Hit
5a8fd983-69f0-4094-b2d4-e7f6aa5ed888.notes: Others can target your eyes at only -6 to hit

9f66a3f1-a89d-48c3-b04e-77eac37d7fa5.name: Higher Purpose (Deliver the Package)
9f66a3f1-a89d-48c3-b04e-77eac37d7fa5.notes: +1 to all rolls made to ferry any important cargo or passenger.

699f1958-098d-4f9c-bce7-159bf0ce9c25.name: Luck
699f1958-098d-4f9c-bce7-159bf0ce9c25.notes: Usable once per hour of play

e0804ffe-b327-4417-989e-aa2ac386a41c.name: Choose four
e0804ffe-b327-4417-989e-aa2ac386a41c.notes: Or three, and raise one by a level.

3af7e059-136d-42f1-94f1-060533d1e289.name: Choose five
3af7e059-136d-42f1-94f1-060533d1e289.notes: Or four, and either raise one by a level, or buy a primary skill (at one level lower than usual).

f77de9e5-fc12-4e88-919d-414a5c307a53.name: Judo
f77de9e5-fc12-4e88-919d-414a5c307a53.notes: Allows parrying two different attacks per turn, one with each hand.

741c6491-9352-4bf9-a8c9-7c293a4bc64a.name: Choose 18 points
741c6491-9352-4bf9-a8c9-7c293a4bc64a.notes: Either two or six points may be used to level-up one of these skills.

ce97fb54-ae7b-44cb-aec5-c0898680ecd3.name: Intelligence
ce97fb54-ae7b-44cb-aec5-c0898680ecd3.notes: Choose 20 points. Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.

93373e32-019f-4995-99a6-32e10a16704c.name: Choose 16 points
93373e32-019f-4995-99a6-32e10a16704c.notes: Either two or six of those points may be used to increase one of these skills by one or two levels.

159ee2a8-4d79-454f-940f-c308f91d54f4.name: Choose 18 points
159ee2a8-4d79-454f-940f-c308f91d54f4.notes: Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.

b80bc70f-e64f-4853-93e6-e7e4962671a1.name: Security
b80bc70f-e64f-4853-93e6-e7e4962671a1.notes: Choose 20 points. Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.
